subject: Simsonn VAM Pro
description_text:
Hi,

I'm Interested on your products VAM pro haptic feedback. Can I use VAM Pro
with Simhub software?

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Alfani Gunawan,  The throttle uses a unidirectional damping design, while the clutch features damping in both directions.

Hi Alfani Gunawan,  ​Yes, SimHub version 9.9.3 already supports our SIMSONN pedals and VAM Pro motor, so you can go ahead with the purchase. Do you already have one of our pedal models—PlusX, ProX, or ProX Ultra? If not, you may need to purchase our PlusX controller separately, as it is required for telemetry-based motor control.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor
ID 号为 57, 474 和 1364 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单57  
      主题: Hydrolic Rod  
      描述:  Is there any difference between Hydraulic Rod for throttle and clutch?   
 Thanks

合并来自工单474  
      主题: Control box  
      描述:  Is there any major difference between pro x and pro x ultra control box? Since I've just bought pro x pedal for 2 weeks and willing to buy the Vam pro. Because I cant spend extra 30$ for pro x ultra control box. It's just too expensive for me.   
 Thanks

合并来自工单1364  
      主题: Simsonn VAM pro  
      描述:  
 
   Hi,    
 I'm Interested on your products VAM pro haptic feedback. Can I use VAM Pro with Simhub software? 
   
 Thanks

I already have simsonn x plus pedal, is it plug and play?

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025, 2:38 PM service@simsonn.com

I have pedal with this controller

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025, 2:55 PM Alfani Gunawan <alfani.gunawan@gmail.com>
wrote:

> I already have simsonn x plus pedal, is it plug and play?
>
> On Wed, Jul 9, 2025, 2:38 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Alfani Gunawan,  Yes, if you already have a Plus X pedal, you can just use the Vam Pro without having to buy an additional control box, plug and play and adjustable with Simhub.
